notes.summary: Developed a Svelte-based chat app allowing users to learn about generative AI by using various LLMs in a responsible and ethical way.
Designed and implemented standardized CI/CD workflows using TeamCity and GitHub Actions, integrating security tools and Docker images, and led the migration to GitHub Enterprise Cloud.
Developed standardized CI tooling with TeamCity templates to optimize development workflows for Java and Python teams.
Enhanced CI/CD pipelines by incorporating JFrog Xray and SonarQube into TeamCity, improving early awareness of security and quality concerns.
Developed a standardized set of enterprise-ready Docker images to streamline certificate installations and environment configurations for development teams.
Automated the migration of all repositories from GitHub Enterprise Server to GitHub Enterprise Cloud, ensuring smooth communication and support throughout the process.
Configured CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions and Reusable Workflows to standardize development practices.
Contributed to on-prem to cloud migration efforts, working alongside a team of bootcamp contractors to accelerate the process.
Contributed to building a cloud-based data science platform's web interface with Angular, integrating Google Cloud Platform services.
Enhanced UI components and developed new features by collaborating with architects, product designers, and data scientists to meet customer needs.
Contributed to the development of a a Python-based API for provisioning compute resources in Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE), ensuring scalable resource management.
Built a cross-platform application with Android, Electron, and Angular, providing busy families with tools for staying connected around meal planning.
Created a Unity 3D experience demonstrating how Category Managers could leverage VR for remote strategic decision-making across different locations.
Built a Unity 3D and HoloLens application demonstrating how mixed reality can enrich the in-store walk-through process with deeper data integration.
Developed an Android application showcasing the potential of AR and shopper data to enhance and personalize existing print experiences.
Developed a feature-rich Android app for the Bunbury and Buckle Up Music Festivals, improving event accessibility and attendee experience.
Assisted in the configuration of an off-the-shelf application using the Gosu JVM-based language and IntelliJ IDEA, focused on managing lines of business for insurance companies.
Built a Java CLI tool for efficient handling of custom messaging protocols, enhancing data exchange between business and banking systems.
Partnered with the internal design team to develop an iPad app that showcased key projects and highlighted company capabilities.
Developed an iPad application backed by SharePoint Lists to catalog sales resources and technical specifications for a window and door company.
Conducted a one-week training course on core Object-Oriented Programming (OOP) and Java language fundamentals.
Developed Android apps for the Kentucky Department of Education, providing essential alerts and information to teachers and technologists.
